sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这学期我选了五门课程。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè xuéqī wǒ xuǎn le wǔ mén kèchéng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce semestre, j'ai choisi cinq cours.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I chose five courses this semester.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen bùnéng luòhòu yú shídài.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous ne pouvons pas être en retard sur notre époque.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We cannot fall behind the times.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā zài bǐsài zhōng défēn zuì gāo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a obtenu le score le plus élevé dans la compétition.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He scored the highest in the competition.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我们需要全面考虑这个问题。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen xūyào quánmiàn kǎolǜ zhège wèntí.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous devons considérer ce problème de manière globale.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We need to consider this problem comprehensively.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen shēnghuó zài xìnxī shídài.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous vivons à l'ère de l'information.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We live in the information age.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 学习是一个漫长的过程。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Xuéxí shì yī gè màncháng de guòchéng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'apprentissage est un long processus.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Learning is a long process.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我希望我的愿望能实现。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ xīwàng wǒ de yuànwàng néng shíxiàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'espère que mon souhait se réalisera.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I hope my wish can come true.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 她演唱了一首流行歌曲。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā yǎnchàng le yī shǒu liúxíng gēqǔ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Elle a interprété une chanson populaire.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: She performed a pop song.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Gǎnjǐn zǒu ba, yào chídào le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Dépêche-toi, on va être en retard.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Hurry up, we're going to be late.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng bǎochí ānjìng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez garder le silence.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please keep quiet.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Yī bù yī bù lái, bùyào zhāojí.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Prends ton temps, pas à pas.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Take it step by step, don't rush.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Yéye měitiān tīng shōuyīnjī.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Grand-père écoute la radio tous les jours.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Grandpa listens to the radio every day.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Yǒnggǎn de xiàng qián jìn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Avance courageusement.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Move forward bravely.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen yào gǎibiàn jiù de guānniàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous devons changer les vieilles idées.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We need to change old concepts.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā jiānjué fǎnduì zhège jìhuà.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il s'oppose fermement à ce plan.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He firmly opposes this plan.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā rèn gōngsī jīnglǐ sān nián le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est directeur de l'entreprise depuis trois ans.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He has been the company manager for three years.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这条规则适用于所有人。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè tiáo guīzé shìyòng yú suǒyǒu rén.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette règle s'applique à tout le monde.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This rule applies to everyone.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Huānyíng shōutīng wǒmen de jiémù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Bienvenue à notre programme.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Welcome to listen to our program.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng cóng lóushàng zǒu xiàlái.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez descendre de l'étage.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please come down from upstairs.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhèlǐ de jǐngsè zhēn měi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le paysage ici est vraiment beau.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The scenery here is really beautiful.
